title: MAVESATRA VE NY ENTANAO?

verses.1:
Irery ve ianao
Ka mavesatr'entana?
Ny hoavinao miafina tsy fantatra?
Mihasasatra ve
Noho ny adim-panahy?
Antsoy hanampy anao Jesosy
verses.2:
Moa ny fiainanao feno alahelo ve?
Mampanahy anao'zay
Hiseho rahampitso?
Mila ho very ve
Izay mba finoanao?
Antsoy hanampy anao Jesosy.

chorus:
Mihaino 'zay vavaka atao tokoa Izy.
Tsy lavitra fa eo anilanao isan'andro
Raha sendra kivy dia tsarovy'zay
Hatao
Miantoraha eo amin'i Jesosy.
